title: Simulating cyber-attack scenarios by discovering Petri Nets from large scale event logs
excerpt: Developed and implemented an innovative approach to cyber-risk evaluation, leveraging log files and Petri-Nets, bridging formal models with cybersecurity.
citation: M. D. Makwana, V. Thakkar, D. Das and R. Kumar, "Simulating Cyber-Attack Scenarios by Discovering Petri-Nets from Large-Scale Event Logs," 2024 16th International Conference on COMmunication Systems & NETworkS (COMSNETS), Bengaluru, India, 2024, pp. 49-54, doi: 10.1109/COMSNETS59351.2024.10427052.

title: Can We Prevent a Future Cyber-Attack on an Oil Pipeline by Learning from Similar Incidents?
venue: IET Cyber-Physical Systems: Theory & Applications, WILEY
excerpt: Performed a post-mortem analysis of three high-profile attacks across varied contexts, demonstrating the potential for these insights to be utilized in the proactive prevention of future cyber threats.

title: PALM: A framework to identify novel attacks in an e-commerce system
venue: 29th IEEE Pacific Rim International Symposium on Dependable Computing (PRDC 2024)
excerpt: Implemented an innovative approach to evaluate cyber risks through a behavioural model of an e-commerce system and conducted the prediction of novel exploits potentially extending from the system.
